scripts.say: So my incomplete form really was no match for you...
Hmph... So it is. Another opportunity to slowly witness my own destruction...
Ultimately, my army was no more than just another Piece... Oh, how ironic... Ahahahahah!

sequence: ...It was not meant to be like this...
In order to become strong enough to protect Ironblood, to protect my allies,
I made so many sacrifices, annihilated so many enemies, just following "orders."
I tolerated becoming a Piece for our detestable enemies,「<Piece>」…
Akagi... Just what are you planning out there?
